00042 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00043 double CodeWordThermal::MatchProbabilistic(int p, int frame, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00044         if (p > alpha*i_max && p < min(beta*i_max, i_min/alpha)) 
00045                 return 0;
00046         else
00047                 return abs(p-(i_min+i_max)/2);
00048 }
00049 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 bool CodeWordThermal::MatchByFactor(int p, int frame, double alpha, double beta, int minAge) {
00051         // brightness distortion
00052         if (p < alpha*i_max || p > min(beta*i_max, i_min/alpha))
00053                 return false;
00054 
00055         return true;
00056 }
00057 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00058 bool CodeWordThermal::MatchByDeviation(int p, int frame, int m_ThermalMin, int m_ThermalMax, int minAge) {
00059         // brightness distortion
00060         const int MAX_RANGE = 50; // maximum size of the codeword (e.g. 50 degrees of temperature)
00061         if (p < i_min-m_ThermalMin || p > i_max+m_ThermalMax || p-i_min > MAX_RANGE || i_max-p > MAX_RANGE)
00062                 return false;
00063 
00064         return true;
00065 }
00066 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00067 void CodeWordThermal::Update(int p, int frame) {        
00068         i_min = min(p, i_min);
00069         i_max = max(p, i_max);
00070         age = age + 1;
00071         if (frame != -1) {
00072                 stale = max(stale, frame - last);
00073                 last = frame;
00074         }
00075 }
00076 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00077 void CodeWordThermal::Serialize( CArchive& archive ) {
00078         CObject::Serialize( archive );
00079         if( archive.IsStoring() )
00080             archive << i_min << i_max << age << stale << first << last;
00081         else 
00082                 archive >> i_min >> i_max >> age >> stale >> first >> last;
00083 }
00084 // --------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 template <> void AFXAPI SerializeElements <CodeWordThermal> ( CArchive& ar, CodeWordThermal* p, INT_PTR nCount )
00086 {
00087     for ( int i = 0; i < nCount; i++, p++ )
00088         p->Serialize( ar );
